body_html:
I would like to take over this feature. What level of C++ expertise is needed. I'm a total C++ noob but am seeing this as an opportunity to learn the language as well as make a meaningful contribution. I was just checking at the python code and this line caught my eye
softmax = nn_ops.softmax(logits)
I presume the C++ equivalent of nn_ops.softmax(logits) is implemented somewhere - I couldn't find out where. Is this correct ? Can someone please point out where to find the equivalent c++ implementation for nn_ops.softmax.

body:
I would like to take over this feature. What level of C++ expertise is needed. I'm a total C++ noob but am seeing this as an opportunity to learn the language as well as make a meaningful contribution. I was just checking at the python code and this line caught my eye
`softmax = nn_ops.softmax(logits)`
I presume the C++ equivalent of nn_ops.softmax(logits) is implemented somewhere - I couldn't find out where. Is this correct ? Can someone please point out where to find the equivalent c++ implementation for nn_ops.softmax.
